entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:52 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow at times mixed with rain in the evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 20 in the evening then light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
